title: POA Core after fast sync
body:
Version      : 1.8.29-0-f5de6a26b-20200430/X64-Linux 4.15.0-66-generic/Core3.1.3
This node    : enode://46727fdbbe2dcd640175f921c99314f16051c616ba8f6f9354cb63613777d0c64b273e290e78000ee45e3ded221e857145deb6397fa17641febc88dfc8e8de23@134.209.177.40:30304
Node address : 0x9efe91e3bbcb20ad0b5d880e5b7587e5699a3fda (do not use as an account)
Mem est tx   :     78MB
Mem est trie :    240MB
Mem est peers:     50MB
Mem est netty:    201MB
Mem est DB   :    487MB
Mem est      :   1056MB
Genesis hash : 0x39f02c003dde5b073b3f6e1700fc0b84b4877f6839bb23edadd3d2d82a488634
DB location  : /root/nethermind_db/poacore
Chainspec    : chainspec/poacore.json
Chain ID     : 99
Chain head   : 0 (0x39f02c...488634)
